item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, March 5, 2025 at 7:15 PM UTC
item.description:

6. How Math Academy pulled me out of the Valley of Despair (51 points | 24 comments)

10. Greptile (YC W24) Is Hiring ( | hide)
11. Apple takes UK to court over 'backdoor' order (58 points | 13 comments)

22. Mox – modern, secure, all-in-one email server (480 points | 259 comments)
23. NASA Successfully Acquires GPS Signals on Moon (226 points | 106 comments)

25. MacBook Air M4 (332 points | 348 comments)

27. Study: The ozone hole is healing, thanks to global reduction of CFCs (5 points | discuss)

29. Asteroid fragments upend theory of how life on Earth bloomed (85 points | 37 comments)
30. Why Vermont farmers are using urine on their crops (101 points | 94 comments)
